segments.text: I can't stand the stupid guy any longer . It ' s unbelievable !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my dear lady . Take it easy . You should forgive a green hand like him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He does everything so mindlessly that he is going to drive me crazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest you talk with him and teach him how to deal with the problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have told him how to do it several times , but he's never listened to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you should communicate with him just like a friend and not a boss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I always have difficulty in getting along with the staff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just take them for your good friends and have a talk with them as we do , make sure you don't lose your temper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that's a bad idea . I'd hate anyone here to think of me as a friend . How would they ever respect me as they can do whatever they want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I disagree . All you have to do is respect the staff and their opinions .
segments.speaker: S2
